name: freckle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small, pale brown spot on the skin, usually on the face, especially of a person with pale skin: He has red hair and freckles. Compare
mole (SPOT)
PhotoAlto/Frederic Cirou/PhotoAlto Agency RF Collections/GettyImages

a small brown spot on the skin, esp. on a light-skinned person: The brothers were in their early teens, and both had reddish hair and freckles. freckled adjective us
